question: Upload a snapshot of the inside of your fridge!
Grab something in the room you're currently in and spend 30 seconds on a video telling us about it. Get inventive if you have to... lol
IF YOU HAVE TATTOOS, show us some of your best ones! (upload a photo)
We want to see an pic inside your vehicle... pic or video, your choice....
Type to us your last text received, DO NOT INCLUDE NAMES/NICKS OR ANY IDENTIFYING INFORMATION. If people will easily guess who it is, do not use that text, skip to another...
Give us a picture of the inside of your food cupboard. ;)
In your sexiest voice, record 5 sentences of any material you like... doens't have to be sexy but you have to make it sound sexy! ;) lolll
Post your favourite LOVE SONG to #music and dedicate it to one person in the group IF you are really daring (this part optional.) ;)
Dare: Eat a spoon full of peanut butter (or other sticky substance).
Show us your destop screen (no sanitizing it or straightening it up ahead of time) .... :)
Take and post a selfie in #selfie-central
I dare you to write out a message to one of our group members and post a pic of it here! lol
Pick up the nearest book or magazine and read us 3 sentences on mic (you'll need to do this on your phone to access the mic.)
If your crush has the role “DMs Open” message them. If they don't have the role. Emote on two of their most recent comments.
Open up Spotify and take a screenshot to show your type of music
Get on MIC and read us your favourite LOVE poem or lyrics. If you're extra courageous, dedicate it to someone on this Discord. ;)
Do a 1 minute video for the Discord and upload it. Your choice of subject and you don't have to be on cam. Just keep it PG13! :)
We dare you to post a pic of your bedroom to the channel! :)
Step outside your home/office and take either a picture or video of what is outside and upload it. :)
Show us some of your favourite cooking devices in either pics or a video. ;)
WITHOUT MAKING ANY CHANGES FIRST, show us your phone's homescreen....
Dare: Go outside and take 5 big breathes. Side quest if you're brave, touch grass.
